players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Bob, that's a very bold claim to make right at the start. If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target?"
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He is the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "This is exactly what I was afraid would happen - we have two people claiming to be the detective and accusing each other. One of you is lying, and we need to figure out who before we vote."
Bob: "I am the real detective. Diana is lying to save herself. Vote Diana to win."
Diana: "Alice, think logically: if I were mafia, why would I counter-claim detective? I'd just deny and hope you vote Bob. My claim proves I'm town trying to stop a false accusation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
